titles.title: When I Look Into Your Loveliness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When I look into Your holiness and I gaze into Your loveliness, Then the things that surround become shadows in the light of You. When I find the joy of reaching Your heart, Then my will becomes enthroned in Your love, And all things that surround become shadows in the light of You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I worship You, I worship You, The reason I live, is to worship You.{/lang-eng}
